content:
mdbook is a valuable way to include code written in .lean files and render it to markdown, which I use frequently.

It would be useful to be able to automatically generate a link from mdbook to the lean4 web. In other words, I would like to be able to generate a link to lean4 web with the contents of the .lean file pasted and embed it in the html.
Wouldn't it be useful to have the above feature?
This has also recently been mentioned here: zulip message, it would most certainly be useful!
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
